thread.title: Mike Gage
thread.title_full: Barking Mad Dog Care reviewed by Mike Gage

author: Mike Gage
title: Mike Gage
text:
Max came home after his stay with Shelia full of joy and we have no doubts he was well looked after.
Shelia picked him up and returned him home on the agreed times, and kept us informed of his welfare by text for the first couple of days, which was very good for are own peace of mind.
We had excellent service and will not hesitate to use the service Shelia offers in the future.
